document_data.name: Firefly
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Firefly''' was a mysterious and rather nondescript shop found in the [[Temple District (Ravens Bluff)|Temple District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Not much was known about the building, its services or owner; in fact, it could only be identified by its name appearing on tax rolls within the city records. 

The shop was located on the west side of [[O'Kane Court]] within the district's [[Swordspoint]] neighborhood.
